hotels.title: Turkiye Modern Urban Escape with Traditional Turkish Hammam Experience
hotels.description: In the heart of the metropolis, Crowne Plaza Ankara, an IHG Hotel makes the ideal base for your exploration of Turkiye's capital city. Make use of the tranquil Spa Vita&Fitness, ideal for recharging between adventures, offering steam sessions in the sauna, a traditional Turkish bathing experience or a relaxing massage. When it comes to dining, look no further than Aura Restaurant for a delicious array of authentic Turkish and international bites from morning to night.
